General.Name: Canadian Premium Sand Inc
General.Description: Canadian Premium Sand Inc., an exploration stage company, explores for and develops silica sand deposits. Its flagship project is the Wanipigow Sand Project consists of 41 contiguous quarry leases covering 2,148 hectares located to the North-East of Winnipeg, Manitoba. The company was formerly known as Claim Post Resources Inc. and changed its name to Canadian Premium Sand Inc. in November 2018. Canadian Premium Sand Inc. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 522-11th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2R 0C8
